roleset.name: express disapproval, express disapproval by saying "boooooo"

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Partisans of the two combatants sat side by side in the 49,000 - plus seats of Oakland Coliseum , and while they cheered their favorites and booed the opposition , hostilities advanced no further , at least as far as I could see .

example.name: with cause
example.text: John was booed for playing to the peanut gallery .

propbank.arg: for playing to the peanut gallery

example.name: arg1
example.text: But the booing of the soldier was terrible make no mistake .

roleset.note: BOO-V NOTES: Frames file for 'boo' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Judgement. (from boo.01-v predicate notes)
BOOING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, boo-v.01. No VNcls. (from booing.01-n)
